SEARCH
Package model

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
model.Stage
public class Stage extends Object
The Stage class represents the stages of a project. It contains information such as the stage name, whether the stage is active or not, the planned start and end dates, the actual start and end dates, and the capsules related to the stage.

    • createCapsule

      public String createCapsule(String description, int capsuleType, String collaboratorName, String collaboratorPosition, String learning)
      Creates a new capsule and adds it to the array of capsules for this stage
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the capsule
      capsuleType - the type of the capsule (1: Technical, 2: Management, 3: Domain, 4: Experience)
      collaboratorName - the name of the collaborator who created the capsule
      collaboratorPosition - the position of the collaborator who created the capsule
      learning - the learning outcomes of the capsule
      Returns:
      a message indicating that the capsule was successfully created

    • getFirstValidPositionCaps

      public int getFirstValidPositionCaps()
      Returns the index of the first valid position in the array of capsules
      Returns:
      the index of the first valid position in the array of capsules, or -1 if the array is full

    • findCapsuleByID

      public Capsule findCapsuleByID(String capsuleID)
      Finds a capsule in the array of capsules with the given capsule ID
      Parameters:
      capsuleID - the ID of the capsule to find
      Returns:
      the capsule with the given ID, or null if no such capsule is found
